English: Tiandihui secret society members in the south of China have rebelled against the ruling Manchu-led Qing dynasty! They sport red-colored turbans, inspired by the previous Red Turban Rebellion which overthrew the Mongol-led Yuan dynasty and established the Ming. They are members of the White Lotus sect, a Maitreyist and millenarian movement forecasting the imminent advent of the "King of Light", the future Buddha Maitreya.

Tiandihui secret society members in the south of China have rebelled against the ruling Manchu-led Qing dynasty! They are members of the White Lotus sect, a Maitreyist and millenarian movement forecasting the imminent advent of the "King of Light", the future Buddha Maitreya.
Tiandihui secret society members in the south of China have rebelled against the ruling Manchu-led Qing dynasty.
A coalition of peasant rebels, secret societies, and bandit outlaws have stormed the Forbidden City and deposed the Qing Emperor.
A coalition of Chinese rebels have deposed the Qing Emperor.
Chinese rebels have deposed the Qing Emperor.
